articles.image_title: Handout file photo dated July 18, 2016 of USS Coronado (LCS 4), an Independence-variant littoral combat ship, launches the first over-the-horizon missile engagement using a Harpoon Block 1C missile in and around the Hawaiian Islands. Denmark will arm Ukraine with a modern Harpoon anti-ship launcher and missiles to protect its coasts, Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin said Monday after concluding the latest U.S.-led meeting of international defense chiefs to coordinate military aid for Ukraine. The announcement came as Russiaâs blockade of Odessa, Ukraineâs largest port on the Black Sea, which is threatening global food supplies. U.S. Navy photo by Lt. Bryce Hadley via ABACAPRESS.COM
